sentences.en: The government has denied that the authorities have uncovered a plot to assassinate the president.
sentences.cn: 政府否认当局已经发现一个暗杀总统的阴谋。

sentences.en: Secretary: President of the Steel Trust, you mean? Do you want to assassinate him?
sentences.cn: 秘书：你是说，钢铁托拉斯的总经理？你要行刺他吗。

sentences.en: In 1981, when John Hinckley tried to assassinate him, he cracked a string of jokes while doctors were dealing with near-fatal lung wounds.
sentences.cn: 1981年约翰·欣克利(John Hinckley)实施了针对他的刺杀行动，让他险些失去生命。在医生忙着处理那靠近肺部伤口时，他居然还在讲着一连串的笑话。
